#include "liveresourcemanager.h"
#include <maya/MFnMesh.h>
#include <maya/MDagPathArray.h>
#include <maya/MObjectArray.h>
#include <maya/MPlugArray.h>
#include <maya/MGlobal.h>
#include "plugincontext.h"
#include "jobcontext.h"

namespace beastmaya {
        LiveResourceManager::LiveResourceManager() : AsyncTask(L"liveResourceManager") {
        } 

        void LiveResourceManager::postUpdate(const MObject& object) {
                m_updateLock.lock();
                m_pendingUpdates[object] = time(NULL);
                m_updateLock.unlock();
        }

        void LiveResourceManager::processUpdates() {
                while (!m_terminationRequested) {

                        m_updateLock.lock();
                        std::unordered_map<MObject, time_t>::iterator it = m_pendingUpdates.begin();
                        while (it != m_pendingUpdates.end()) {
                                //Arbitrary time in seconds that an object needs to be idle before processing it.
                                //We do this to avoid re-exporting meshes that are in a transitional state.
                                if (time(NULL)-(it->second)>1) {
                                        break;
                                }
                                it++;
                        }
        
                        //Nothing to update; sleep for 1 second.        
                        if (it == m_pendingUpdates.end()) {
                                m_updateLock.unlock();
                                Sleep(1000);
                                continue;
                        }

                        const MObject processObject = (it->first);
                        m_pendingUpdates.erase(it);
                        m_updateLock.unlock();

                        updateResource(processObject);
                }
        }

        void LiveResourceManager::updateResource(const MObject& obj)
        {
                MStatus res;

                // Handle mesh updates
                MFnMesh mesh(obj, &res);
                if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        updateMesh(mesh);
                        return;
                }

                // Handle texture updates
                MFnDependencyNode node(obj, &res);
                if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        MPlug plug = node.findPlug(L"outColor", true, &res);
                        if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                                updateTexture(node);
                                return;
                        }
                }
        }

        void LiveResourceManager::updateMesh(const MFnMesh& mesh)
        {
                MDagPathArray paths;
                mesh.getAllPaths(paths);

                // Re-export all unique instances of this mesh and update
                std::wstring updateId = getGuid();
                for (unsigned int i = 0; i < paths.length(); i++) {
                        MDagPath instancePath(paths[i]);
                        instancePath.pop();

                        // Check if this is actually a valid name, sometimes we get a dirty node message on deleted meshes
                        if(instancePath.fullPathName().length() == 0) {
                                continue;
                        }

                        std::wstring script = L"\
import pymel.core \n\
pymel.core.mel.beastCreateMesh('" + std::wstring(instancePath.fullPathName().asWChar()) + L"', '" + updateId + L"') \n\
";
                        MStatus res = MGlobal::executePythonCommandOnIdle(script.c_str());
                        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);
                }
        }

        void LiveResourceManager::updateTexture(const MFnDependencyNode& node)
        {
                MStatus res;
                MPlug plug = node.findPlug(L"outColor", true, &res);
                std::vector<std::pair<MObject, std::wstring>> connectedNodes;
                getConnectedNodes(plug, connectedNodes);
                for (std::size_t i = 0; i < connectedNodes.size(); ++i) {
                        std::pair<MObject, std::wstring>& connectedNode = connectedNodes[i];
                        MFnDependencyNode depNode(connectedNode.first, &res);
                        std::wstring name = depNode.name().asWChar();
                        std::wstring updateId = getGuid();

                        std::wstring script = L"\
import pymel.core \n\
pymel.core.mel.beastCreateTexture('" + name + L"', '" + connectedNode.second + L"', '" + updateId + L"') \n\
";

                        res = MGlobal::executePythonCommandOnIdle(script.c_str());
                        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);
                }
        }
}
